examples.full_description: AuthorsController showing an author shows an author
AuthorsController creating a valid author creates successfully
AuthorsController creating a valid author redirects to show page
AuthorsController creating an invalid author does not save
AuthorsController creating an invalid author does not create

AuthorsController creating an invalid author renders the form again
PostsController showing a post shows a post
PostsController making valid updates updates successfully
PostsController making valid updates redirects to show page
PostsController making invalid updates does not save
PostsController making invalid updates does not update
